name: Klax
description:
Klax is an arcade-puzzle game developed by Atari Games and Tengen. It was originally released in 1989. Domark published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Klax on Atari ST, Atari 2600, Game Boy Advance and Atari 5200.
It was produced by Greg Omi, John Ray, John Ray (Game producer) and Susan G. McBride. It was directed by Michael Mika Sr.. Alex Rudis & Bob Viera, Brad Fuller, Matt Furniss and Robert Baffy scored the game.
